link_desc:
With the psycopg2 driver zbxdb monitors postgres. Currently monitoring

  • availability
  • sizing
  • sessions
  • slave lag
  • bloat

New items are easily added, just find the SQL that retrieves the info and combine that with a key.

Tested on v9, v10 and v11. No messing around with extra modules on the database server.

Are you missing a metric? just add the sql to etc/zbxdb_checks/postgres/* depending on your version and role (primary/slave) (or do a feature request on GitHub)

Is a version missing? Start with copying the postgres checks that matches your version the best.

See https://github.com/ikzelf/zbxdb for more info.
features: Low Level Discovery (LLD)|Zabbix Trapper|Database Monitor|Custom Script
author: Ronald Rood
